subscription.subject: {school}: Subscription: {date}
subscription.content:
{school} has registered you for the date of {date}

Appointment information

  • Date: {date}
  • Meeting point: {meetingPoint}
  • Description: {description}
  • Max participants: {maxPeople}

informWaitingStudent.subject: {school}: Registration for: {date}
informWaitingStudent.content:
Someone has unsubscribed for the appointment from {date}. You can now participate.

Appointment information

  • Date: {date}
  • Meeting point: {meetingPoint}
  • Description: {description}
  • Max participants: {maxPeople}

student.subject: Share flightbook
student.content:
Hello

{school} invite you to share your flightbook. You can accept this invitation by follow the link below.

Link : {link}

The link expire {date}

teamMember.subject: Team member {school}
teamMember.content:
{school} invite you to be member of his team. You can accept this invitation by follow the link below.

Link: {link}

The link expire {date}
